text: WREP-LD is a low-power television station in Martinsville, Indiana, broadcasting locally as a YTA TV affiliate (formerly Youtoo TV, later Youtoo America) on channel 15. The station is owned by the Metropolitan School District of Martinsville. In addition to America One programming, the station broadcasts over 100 IHSAA sporting events and Coaches' shows throughout the year. ==External links== * REP-LD Category:Television channels and stations established in 1990 Category:Digital low-power television stations Category:Youtoo America affiliates
title: WREP-LD
